identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% apartment association app that blends civic trust with organic warmth.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix civic utility with botanical warmth.
Emotion First: Calm, organized, and transparent.
Content is King: Data visualization is the hero.
Zoom In: Focus on key metrics (dues, occupancy).
Negative Space: Use generous padding to reduce financial anxiety.
Contrast: High contrast for accessibility and hierarchy.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, Receipt Numbers, Code Snippets

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700;800&family=Public+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Trust, Growth, Stability

spacing_system.rule: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. Containers with borders must have p-6 or p-8.

admin_dashboard.strategy: Dense, data-heavy. Summary cards (col-span-1), Main Chart (col-span-2 row-span-2), Feed (col-span-1 row-span-2).

resident_dashboard.strategy: Asymmetric. Hero (col-span-full md:col-span-8), Quick Actions (col-span-4), History (col-span-full).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 py-2 rounded-md

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on solid backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.

mapping.description: Apartment building during golden hour - Use for Login Page Background or Resident Dashboard Hero
White Concrete Apartment Building - Use for Flats Management Header
Professional Woman in Suit - Use for Admin Profile / Welcome Message

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text.
accessibility.interactive: Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2).
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Update tailwind.config.js with the color palette. Import fonts in index.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use Shadcn for complex logic (Dialog, Form, Table). Customize styles to match the 'Organic & Earthy' theme.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Implement the 'Control Room' grid for Admin Dashboard and 'Tetris' grid for Resident Dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts) with the defined chart colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.icons: Use lucide-react for icons. Keep them simple and consistent.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure: Maintain the existing structure. Create new components in src/components/ui or src/components/custom.

universal_guidelines.avoid_slop: Do not use generic gradients or centered layouts. Use asymmetry and texture.
universal_guidelines.micro_interactions: Add hover states and transitions to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous spacing (p-8, p-12) to create breathing room.
universal_guidelines.exports: Named exports for components, default exports for pages.
